text: This week I integrated Github Actions with Observable so I can take backups and publish to NPM automatically (eventually) <https://twitter.com/tomlarkworthy/status/1475383403285467145>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/tomlarkworthy|@tomlarkworthy>: Increase the power of <https://twitter.com/observablehq|@observablehq> by triggering <https://twitter.com/github|@github> actions from notebooks. With this notebook you can pre-authenticate triggers so there is no need to input a token.

<https://observablehq.com/@tomlarkworthy/repository-dispatch>

Increase the power of <https://twitter.com/observablehq|@observablehq> by triggering <https://twitter.com/github|@github> actions from notebooks. With this notebook you can pre-authenticate triggers so there is no need to input a token.

elements.text: This week I integrated Github Actions with Observable so I can take backups and publish to NPM automatically (eventually)
